website_summaries.verdict: This premium-quality aluminum cube toy is available in six colors and includes a case.
pros: Handheld cube toy is made from premium aluminum alloy
Smooth surface and smooth rotation, with no oil needed
Sturdy case is small enough for pockets
Releases excess energy, helps ADD/ADHD, OCD, autism, high stress, and anxiety
Great gift for kids or adults

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and perfect size, but slightly damaged. Still work the price.
customer_reviews.text: It has a great weight to it and easily fits into my hand so I can use it with only one hand. The only disappointment is the gouge in the metal on one side. Other than that, it’s a quality product that is well built and will last a long time. I recommend the silver so that the color doesn’t rub off as that may be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Well built and heavy.  Very satisfying.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true figiter. I use everything. The Fube is my fave! Of all the infinity cubes, I like this one the best because it's not only well built, but heavy. I don't want a piece of plastic. This is very satisfying to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Henley

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery, nice case, decent fidgeter.
customer_reviews.text: One of the hinges is a little wonky, got a little better with some oil, but far from perfect. It's a good fidgeter overall. Substantial weight in your hand, good feel, it works pretty well. Comes with a pretty nice little zipper case that I'll probably use to keep track of thumb drives and such. Nice little bonus.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greeno

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I am surprised by how heavy it is, but I am. I'm actually a little worried that the hinges are thin compared to the weight of the cubes! It's held up well with a few hours of use, though. Definitely a slower, thoughtful fidget than many given the heft of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Mine might be a dud
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I'm disappointed that some of the joints are misaligned and squeak. It rotates smoothly and quietly half the time, but the other times, it's difficult to put into a new position and the squeak is annoying. Not worth the money, but maybe I kust got a dud for my first one?
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Goeders

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Got this cube after buying one of lower quality that broke before a week of use. This one was not moving smoothly when it arrived and I reached out to the seller for advice. They without hesitation sent me a new one to replace it. It as well didn't move smoothly. However, I believe it is due to the machining of some of the hinges are slightly larger. I used some lubricant and worked on it for a while and now it moves like a dream and doesn't break when it is dropped on the floor. Although I have worried that it would dent my wood floor. Great product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: B-S-H

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining for someone with OCD. I can play with it for hours. I find it robust. I am not sure why others found it not as well-made. Maybe some end up being defective. I will report again when/if it breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Greek Geek

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, good quality, good toy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good weight to it, and is very satisfying to fidget with, after you get the hang of using it one handed. Some of the joints were a little stiff, but a little WD-40 cleared that right up!
customer_reviews.author: Henry C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made with some weight to it!
customer_reviews.text: Really well made! Nothing cheap about this product. I showed it to a friend who is recovering from thumb surgery as I thought it might help with improving her range of motion. She loved it & immediately ordered one! Would order for gifts as well. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Marci L. Binns

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Gave it as gift it was well received 👍
customer_reviews.author: Pz14559

EXCLUSIVE PROTECTIVE CASE: theFube Infinity Cube by PILPOC includes an Exclusive, high quality, beautiful case that keeps the cube intact. You can carry it all
